member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CUSTOM_RATE
member.summary: Specifies a custom rate for frame-rate conversion or inverse telecine (IVTC).

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CUSTOM_RATE.CustomRate
member.summary: The ratio of the output frame rate to the input frame rate, expressed as a structure that holds a rational number.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CUSTOM_RATE.OutputFrames
member.summary: The number of output frames that will be generated for every N input samples, where N = InputFramesOrFields.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CUSTOM_RATE.InputInterlaced
member.summary: If TRUE, the input stream must be interlaced. Otherwise, the input stream must be progressive.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_CUSTOM_RATE.InputFramesOrFields
member.summary: The number of input fields or frames for every N output frames that will be generated, where N = OutputFrames.
